price: "Kuma Ka sanya mini harshen gaskiya* a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe."
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
footnotes: * Harshen gaskiya shĩ ne yabõ mai kyau. Mutãnen ƙarshe sũ ne Musulmi al'ummar Annabi Muhammadu, mãsu shaida ga annabawa da iyar da manzanci

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
